data.title: Things to do in Offenbach in December – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Offenbach in December and activities that are perfect for a December trip to Offenbach.
data.text:
Overview

December is a good time to visit Offenbach. The weather is usually really cold and breezy, with temperatures ranging from 30—40°F (-1—5°C).

Offenbach has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your December trip to Offenbach. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to December. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Offenbach in December. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout December, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Offenbach? See our Offenbach Trip Planner.

Weather in Offenbach in December

Temperatures on an average day in Offenbach in December

The average temperature in Offenbach in December for a typical day ranges from a high of 40°F (5°C) to a low of 30°F (-1°C). Some would describe it as really cold and breezy.

For comparison, the hottest month in Offenbach, July, has days with highs of 80°F (27°C) and lows of 58°F (14°C). The coldest month, January has days with highs of 38°F (4°C) and lows of 28°F (-2°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Offenbach in December based on historical data.

Visiting Offenbach? See our Offenbach Trip Planner.

What to wear

What to wear in December

With an average high of 40°F (5°C) and a low of 30°F (-1°C), it generally feels really cold and breezy. There might also be a small chance of rain. With that in mind, most people would dress in something warm like a jacket
